titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1699) to authorize appropriations for the Coast Guard for fiscal year 2002.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-86, by Mrs. Myrick.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 1699 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit with or without instructions. Measure will be considered read. Bill is open to amendments. House Resolutions 130, 147, 149 and 150 are laid on the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 37.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 155.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/5/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (modified open) for the consideration of H.R. 1699 (authorizing FY 2002 appropriations for the Coast Guard).
